content: I have problem with contained, I setup HAPI 5.3.0 Server and tried to put the PlanDefinition on that but I cannot serialize to JSON or XML using FHIR Client (I used JSON Parser and XML Parser). I tried to put the JSON text with contained to HAPI Server and get it back from Server and I can see the data (Java Object) with list of contained, so I think it is the problem of Serialization in FHIR Client? Please give me an advice
